Text: Plot: Before Underbelly, there was Abe Saffron, Australias first and most notorious Godfather, who ruled the underworld like a modern Caesar. For 40 years, the so-called Mr Sin was at the forefront of organised crime in Sydney. This riveting documentary is a story of bribery, blackmail and corruption and examines how Australias enigmatic crime boss Abe Saffron remained untouchable for so long.
